section.title: Adding Support for PDF Images
section.p: Starting with version 20.0, PDF image support is enabled by default in the built-in transformation scenario. For older versions of , use the following procedures to enable this support:

ol.li: Edit the DITA-OT transformation scenario and switch to the Advanced tab.
Click the Libraries button and add the path to the libraries.
Go to the JCGM page and download the jcgm-image-0.1.1.jar and jcgm-core-0.2.0.jar libraries.
Edit the DITA-OT transformation scenario and switch to the Advanced tab.
Click the Libraries button and add the path to the libraries.

section.title: Adding Hyphenation Support for DITA-OT Transformation Scenarios

ol.li: Download the pre-compiled JAR from OFFO.
Edit the DITA-OT transformation scenario and switch to the Advanced tab.
Click the Libraries button and add the path to the fop-hyph.jar library.
